\.\C[3]A pile of books. Stable enough to stand on.
\.\C[3]A box that has a lid affixed with screws.
\.\C[4](Could probably open it with a \C[2]flathead screwdriver\C[4].
I don't have that tool, though...)
\.\C[3]Notes of some kind are scattered about.
Along with some people I don't know.)
\.\C[4](Seems it's designed so I can't carry it...)
\.\C[4](If I jam a tool between the tiles,
I bet I can open it up.)
\.\C[3]A red liquid spreads beneath the floor.
\.\C[4](If I pour in water to increase the water volume...)
\.\C[4](...Would prefer to avoid touching the liquid.)
\.\C[3]A red liquid fills the space beneath the floor.
\.\C[3]The corners of the frame are held by screws and nails.
\.\C[4](Okay, I have all four tools I need.
Is the idea that I need four different tools
Should I run before he wakes up...?!)
\.\C[4](I don't know if he's a good person...
\.\C[3]At great length, I got the man on my shoulder.
\.\C[4](He doesn't seem to be hurt, but...
A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
\C[3]A note with some names, including Prof. Mishima.
There's also the name Alice Yabusame.
\C[3]A painting of a man in profile.
Not sharp enough to pierce anything.
\C[3]A tool for spraying the liquid inside.
Droplets of water stick to it.
